articles.author: Don Silas
articles.title: UECL final: Prize money for AS Roma after winning trophy revealed - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: The prize money for AS Roma after winning the 2021/22 UEFA Europa Conference League (UECL) trophy has been revealed. UEFA will pay Roma £4.25m/$5.35m for winning this year’s UECL ahead of Feyenoord. The Europe top football governing body will also pay Feyenoo…
articles.content:
The prize money for AS Roma after winning the 2021/22 UEFA Europa Conference League (UECL) trophy has been revealed.
UEFA will pay Roma £4.25m/$5.35m for winning this years UECL ahead of Feyenoord.… [+502 chars]

articles.title: Warning signs ahead of monkeypox outbreak went unheeded, experts say - STAT
articles.description: Monkeypox appears to have exploded out of nowhere in the past two weeks, spreading across Europe, the Americas, and other regions. But warning signs appear to have gone unheeded.
articles.content:

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Roma's Jose Mourinho makes European coaching history with Conference League title - ESPN
articles.description: An emotional Jose Mourinho celebrated an historic achievement having become the second manager to win five major European titles.
articles.content: An emotional Jose Mourinho celebrated an historic achievement having become the second manager to win five major European titles after Giovanni Trapattoni as his AS Roma side clinched the UEFA Europa… [+3261 chars]

articles.author: Juniour Khumalo
articles.title: Africa Day: EFF in protest outside French embassy, says continent 'remains at mercy of former colonial masters' - News24
articles.description: Commemorating Africa Day, the EFF marched to the French Embassy, to demand the European country withdraw its troops on the African continent.
articles.content:
• There was a standoff outside the French Embassy when the EFF refused to leave until it handed over a memorandum to the ambassador.
